name: International Beach Volleyball
description:
International Beach Volleyball is a simulation videogame of the most played summer game in the world.

Discover the exciting atmosphere of the Professional Beach Volleyball World Tour, challenging the best players in the world.

Digging, setting, blocking, power spike...all the actions of the real sport....without the sunburn.

Characteristics:

- Play against 16 national teams
- Button for jumps and blocks
- Button for spike, pass and dig
- Each team has different attack and defence ability
- 3D and HD graphics

- The game is "universal", compatible with iPhone and iPad
- Supports retina display

Try International Beach Volleyball and rate it!
